Class DbConfigurationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhubframework.openhub.admin.web.common.AbstractOhfController
      • org.openhubframework.openhub.admin.web.configuration.rest.DbConfigurationController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/config-params")
public class DbConfigurationController
extends AbstractOhfController

      • update

        @RequestMapping(value="/{code:.+}",
                method=PUT,
                produces={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @ResponseStatus(value=NO_CONTENT)
 @ResponseBody
public void update(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                      String code,
                                                                                                                                                                                                      @RequestBody
